subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Texas quarterback Colt McCoy threw two touchdown passes to tie a single-season record for freshmen and Texas rallied to defeat Iowa, 26-24, yesterday in the Alamo Bowl in San Antonio.
snippet: Texas quarterback Colt McCoy threw two touchdown passes to tie a single-season record for freshmen and Texas rallied to defeat Iowa, 26-24, yesterday in the Alamo Bowl in San Antonio.
